trans-unit.source: No Add() method defined on "{0}{1}".
trans-unit.target: 未在“{0}{1}”上定义 Add() 方法。
trans-unit.note: 0 is type name, 1 is property name

trans-unit.source: Missing a "public static Get{0}" method or a public instance property getter for the attached property "{1}.{0}Property".
trans-unit.target: 对于附加属性 "{1}.{0}Property"，缺少 "public static Get{0}" 方法或公共实例属性 getter。
trans-unit.note: 0 is BindableProperty name, 1 is the declaring type

trans-unit.source: The name of the BindableProperty {0} does not end with "Property".
trans-unit.target: BindableProperty {0} 的名称不是以 "Property" 结尾的。

trans-unit.source: Binding: Indexer did not contain arguments.
trans-unit.target: 绑定: 索引器未包含参数。

trans-unit.source: Binding: Indexer did not contain closing bracket.
trans-unit.target: 绑定: 索引器未包含右方括号。

trans-unit.source: Binding: "{0}" cannot be parsed as an index for a "{1}".
trans-unit.target: 绑定: 无法将“{0}”作为“{1}”的索引进行分析。
trans-unit.note: 0 is indexer value, 1 is property name

trans-unit.source: Binding: Unsupported indexer index type: "{0}".
trans-unit.target: 绑定: 不受支持的索引器索引类型:“{0}”。

trans-unit.source: Binding: Property "{0}" not found on "{1}".
trans-unit.target: 绑定: 在“{1}”上找不到属性“{0}”。
trans-unit.note: 0 is property name, 1 is type name

trans-unit.source: Missing default constructor for "{0}".
trans-unit.target: 缺少“{0}”的默认构造函数。

trans-unit.source: Missing constructor for "{0}" with matching x:Arguments.
trans-unit.target: “{0}”中缺少具有匹配的 x:Arguments 的构造函数。

trans-unit.source: Cannot set the content of "{0}" as it doesn't have a [ContentProperty] attribute.
trans-unit.target: 无法设置“{0}”的内容，因为它没有 [ContentProperty] 属性。

trans-unit.source: Cannot convert value "{0}" to "{1}".
trans-unit.note: 0 is a value, 1 is a type

trans-unit.source: Enum value not found for "{0}".
trans-unit.target: 找不到“{0}”的枚举值。

trans-unit.source: Invalid Xaml "{0}".
trans-unit.target: Xaml“{0}”无效。

trans-unit.source: Markup expression not closed.
trans-unit.target: 标记表达式未关闭。

trans-unit.source: Error while parsing markup expression.
trans-unit.target: 分析标记表达式时出错。

trans-unit.source: No property, BindableProperty, or event found for "{0}", or mismatching type between value and property.
trans-unit.target: 未找到“{0}”的属性、BindableProperty 或事件，或者值与属性之间的类型不匹配。

trans-unit.source: No static method found for "{0}::{1} ({2})".
trans-unit.note: 0 is type name, 1 is methodname, 2 is type arg list

trans-unit.source: EventHandler "{0}" with correct signature not found in type "{1}".
trans-unit.target: 在类型“{1}”中找不到具有正确签名的 EventHandler“{0}”。
trans-unit.note: 0 is the handler name, 1 is the declaring type

trans-unit.source: An element with the name "{0}" already exists in this NameScope.
trans-unit.target: 此 NameScope 中已存在名为“{0}”的元素。

trans-unit.source: Missing mandatory property "{0}" on "{1}".
trans-unit.note: 0 is a property name, 1 is a type

trans-unit.source: Cannot resolve property "{0}" on type "{1} (property missing or missing accessors)".
trans-unit.target: 无法解析类型“{1}”上的属性“{0}”(缺少属性或访问器)”。
trans-unit.note: 0 is a property name, 1 is a type name

trans-unit.source: "A resource with the key "{0}" is already present in the ResourceDictionary.
trans-unit.target: ResourceDictionary 中已存在具有键“{0}”的资源。

trans-unit.source: Resources in ResourceDictionary require a x:Key attribute.
trans-unit.target: ResourceDictionary 中的资源需具有 x:Key 属性。

trans-unit.source: Resource "{0}" not found.
trans-unit.target: 找不到资源“{0}”。

trans-unit.source: Multi-valued enums are not valid on sbyte enum types.
trans-unit.target: 多值枚举在 sbyte 枚举类型上无效。

trans-unit.source: StyleSheet require either a Source or a content.
trans-unit.target: 样式表需要源或内容。

trans-unit.source: Source property is not a string literal.
trans-unit.target: 源属性不是字符串文本。

trans-unit.source: StyleSheet cannot have both a Source and a content.
trans-unit.target: 样式表不能同时具有源和内容。

trans-unit.source: Style property or Content is not a string literal.
trans-unit.target: 样式属性或内容不是字符串文本。

trans-unit.source: Cannot resolve type "{0}".
trans-unit.target: 无法解析类型“{0}”。

trans-unit.source: x:DataType expects a string literal, an {{x:Type}} markup or {{x:Null}}.
trans-unit.target: x:DataType 需要字符串文本、{{x:Type}} 标记或 {{x:Null}}。

trans-unit.source: x:Key expects a string literal.
trans-unit.target: x:Key expects a string literal.

trans-unit.source: x:Static: unable to find a public -- or accessible internal -- static field, static property, const or enum value named "{0}" in "{1}".
trans-unit.target: x:Static: 在“{1}”中找不到公共(或可访问的内部)静态字段、静态属性、常量或枚举值“{0}”。

trans-unit.source: Syntax for x:Static is "[Member=][prefix:]typeName.staticMemberName".
trans-unit.target: x:Static 的语法为 "[Member=][prefix:]typeName.staticMemberName"。

trans-unit.source: Undeclared xmlns prefix "{0}".
trans-unit.target: xmlns 前缀“{0}”未经过声明。
